segments.text: I see the woman drying a plate, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies, and that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids have done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
